People

Our Team

Leaders and advisors committed to advancing democracy, freedom, and ethics through trusted, nonpartisan collaboration.

Founding Partners (3) Advisors (1)

Founding Partners

Vishal Amin

Founding Partner

From fighter pilot to cybersecurity executive to nonprofit founder

  • 20-year Marine Corps Fighter Pilot (F/A-18 WSO)
  • Former GM, Microsoft National Security Group ($6.5B)
  • Presidential Scholar, Bush Center

Founder of Spades Institute and Operating Partner at Crosspoint Capital. Former Marine Corps Fighter Pilot and Microsoft GM who led a $6.5B National Security business.

Read full bio

Vishal Amin is the Founder of Spades Institute and currently serves as an Operating Partner at Crosspoint Capital, where he focuses on cybersecurity and infrastructure software investments. His journey spans two decades of service as a Marine Corps Fighter Pilot (F/A-18 WSO), followed by transformative leadership roles in the private sector that have shaped national security collaboration.

After his distinguished 20-year career in the United States Marine Corps, Vishal transitioned to Microsoft where he served as GM & Executive Leader of the National Security Group, responsible for the growth and vision of Microsoft's Security Business supporting the United States Federal Government. Under his leadership, the Security business exceeded $6.5 billion and comprised seven businesses with professionals solving the most challenging missions for the federal government.

A Presidential Scholar and graduate of the George W. Bush Presidential Center's Stand-To Leadership Program, Vishal is committed to investing positive influence across the nation, including serving veteran and service-based communities.

Lili Davoudian

Founding Partner

Cloud security expert bridging policy, technology, and operations

  • Senior Director, Microsoft Security
  • Former Director, National Security Group
  • Focus: Zero Trust, AI Security

Cloud security subject matter expert with 8+ years at Microsoft, leading teams to showcase technical excellence in security platforms and AI security.

Read full bio

Lili Davoudian is a cloud security subject matter expert with over eight years of experience at Microsoft, where she currently serves as Senior Director leading a team responsible for showcasing the technical excellence of Microsoft's security platform, with a focus on security for and with AI.

Throughout her career at Microsoft, Lili has held key roles including Director of the National Security Group, where she led multi-disciplinary teams of sales engineers and specialists to bring Microsoft security solutions to government customers. She has deep expertise in Zero Trust architecture, Microsoft Sentinel, Azure Security, and Microsoft Defender for Cloud.

Lili's unique ability to operate at the intersection of policy, technology, and operations enables her to translate strategic vision into measurable impact.

Tim Kosiba

  • Mission leadership alignment

Designs resilient engagement models that unite mission leadership, entrepreneurs, and practitioners to solve national security risks.
